import "./Panier.css"; import { useNavigate } from "react-router-dom"; export default function Panier() { let panier = localStorage.getItem("panier"); let p = JSON.parse(panier); let Navigate = useNavigate(); let handelNavigate = () => { Navigate("/"); }; let handelAffich = () => { let section = document.getElementsByClassName("commander")[0]; alert('section') }; return (
Article Libelle Prix Quantites total
{" "} {p.libelle} {p.prix} {p.Quantité} {p.prix}
); }
